about_the_game:
Experience a Slice of the Wastelands with Frontiers of Ruin – Demo Edition

Step into the post-apocalyptic world of Frontiers of Ruin, where tactical card strategy meets a ruined future. In this exclusive demo, you’ll command a limited but powerful 70-card deck from the Wasteland Nomads faction—just one of the five distinct factions awaiting you in the full game. Each card is crafted to embody the spirit of a ravaged world where survival hinges on adaptability, cunning, and strategic foresight.

Demo Features:

One Faction, Infinite Possibilities: Explore the full mechanics of Frontiers of Ruin through the unique lens of the Wasteland Nomads. As masters of mobility and resourcefulness, the Nomads bring versatile tactics and unique abilities, giving you a taste of what’s to come in the final release.

Condensed Strategy, Endless Depth: Featuring only 70 cards, the demo challenges you to uncover synergies and optimize your strategy within this focused selection. With cards and gameplay tailored to show the depth of the Nomads’ arsenal, it’s a chance to see how factions will impact play in diverse and evolving ways.

Immersive Gameplay: Built on a tactical 5x7 grid, the game’s unique placement mechanics, card ranks, and strategic depth provide endless opportunities for tactical mastery. Make every card count as you fight for dominance across the wasteland!

This demo showcases only a fragment of Frontiers of Ruin's post-apocalyptic strategy. Wishlist Frontiers of Ruin now and be among the first to explore the full conflict when all five factions emerge in the complete game, featuring 480 cards that span the fractured remains of civilization.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: In Frontiers of Ruin Demo, enter a post-apocalyptic world on the brink of chaos, where survival depends on cunning, alliances, and strategy. Choose your faction and battle across a 5x7 board, shaping the future of Othren in this gripping trading card game. Will you conquer or save a shattered world?
